Articles.Content:
It looks cool, but I can't find it anywhere and it says "go inside the sun"..?
(if there's an addon that adds the wormhole to 1.4.x please send it to me)

I asked the AVP dev on the KSP discord and this is what he says:


There do is a mod named KopernicusExpansion, which has the ability to add in wormholes.
KEX doesn't do that on itself, but rather needs planet modders to do it(like how EVE doesn't add in clouds on its own)

4 hours ago, GrandProtectorDark said:


I asked the AVP dev on the KSP discord and this is what he says:


There do is a mod named KopernicusExpansion, which has the ability to add in wormholes.
KEX doesn't do that on itself, but rather needs planet modders to do it(like how EVE doesn't add in clouds on its own)

i've wrote a simple thing on kopernicus that adds a wormhole but the eve clouds don't show (i have a thread about that actually)
